data.name: LicenseDialog_campusLicenseExpiryInfoLabel
data.value:
The license key you are using is valid until {0}.
If your organization renews the site license, you can continue to use Citavi with no limitations. We will notify you by email about site license renewals.
If the site license is not renewed, or if you leave the organization, you cannot continue using this license key. To continue using Citavi, consider the following offer:

data.name: LicenseDialog_copyLicenseKeyClipboardFailedLabel

Enter the license key by hand, paying attention to capitalization.

1.&edsp;&edsp;Log in to your account: www.citavi.com/my-account

2.&edsp;&edsp;Copy the license key to the Clipboard.

3.&edsp;&edsp;Click OK.

data.name: LicenseDialog_Problem
data.value: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang2055{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Segoe UI;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green255\blue255;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2509;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs18 The license entered is not valid.\par \par Common causes:\par \bullet Typos (including capitalization).\par \bullet For personal licenses, the word "Personal" \par \cf1\bullet \cf0 is missing in the Organization field.\par \bullet For site licenses, the expiration date is missing.\par \par Click \b Back\b0 and carefully verify the information.\par \par If you continue to receive this error after double-\par checking, contact us at www.citavi.com/service\par }

data.name: EditCitationStyleSASInternalDialog_introductionLabel_Derived
data.value: Der Stil '{0}' ist ein abgeleiteter Stil, der auf dem Master-Stil '{1}' basiert.

data.name: EditCitationStyleSASInternalDialog_option1DescriptionLabel_Derived
data.value: Statt des abgeleiteten Stils wird der Master-Stil '{0}' zum Bearbeiten geöffnet.

data.name: EditCitationStyleSASInternalDialog_option2DescriptionLabel_Derived
data.value: Der abgeleitete Stil wird kopiert und zum Bearbeiten geöffnet. Die Kopie ist nicht mehr mit dem Master-Stil verbunden und kann z.B. als unabhängiger System-Stil in die Cloud geladen werden.

data.name: EditCitationStyleSASInternalDialog_option3DescriptionLabel_Derived
data.value: Der abgeleitete Stil wird direkt zum Bearbeiten geöffnet. Er kann nicht in die Cloud geladen werden, da er nach wie vor mit dem Master-Stil verbunden bleibt. Die lokalen Änderungen am Stil gehen verloren, sobald eine neuere Version aus der Cloud zur Verfügung steht. Sie können den abgeleiteten Stil aber in den Zitationsstil-Eigenschaften aus seinem Master-Verbund herauslösen.

data.name: ComplexTextEditWarning

data.value: All reference types (reference types already used appear in bold)

data.name: SupportInformationDialog_titleLabel
data.value: The following information helps us better answer your support question:

data.name: EditBuildCitationStyleWarningMsgBox_Description
data.value:
Creating or modifying citation styles is a job for specialists. The Citavi Team will gladly create a citation style for you, as long as it is the official style of a periodical or publisher that has author guidelines.
Please use the following form to request a new style: www.citavi.com/stylerequest
Please note that the Citation Style Editor is only available in English and German. In the Reference Editor, click "Tools" > "Change language" if you need to change the language.
data.comment: This does not make sense for people using the EN - UI.

data.value: To change the reference filter criteria, switch to References

data.name: ImportWizardDialog_bibliographyImportInfoTextEditor
data.value:
The quality of your results depends on
a) entries being correctly separated from one another. Please make surethat each reference is in a paragraph by itself.
b) that any links, ISBNs, DOI names, and other identifiers do not contain any spaces. Please delete any line breaks that were present in the PDF document.

data.name: OptionsDialog_telemetryScopeCeipRadioButton
data.value: Send usage information to help improve Citavi

data.name: OptionsDialog_telemetryScopeCeipLabel
data.value: Important: We cannot guarantee that only anonymous information is sent.&edsp;&edsp;Read this information before enabling this option.
data.comment:
JS - review: Previous version: Citavi sends two types of information:
a) Anonymous statistical information (e.g. number of references in the project);
b) Internal error reports and program warnings.
Please note: Your error reports help us improve Citavi, and we'd be very grateful if you select this option. However, we cannot guarantee that only anonymous information is sent. Additional information can be found in the Citavi manual.

data.name: ExceptionDialog_infoEditor
data.value: Please allow Citavi to send diagnostic information to our server so that we can fix the error. Your information will be kept confidential. Learn more in our Privacy policy. If the error occurs again, please contact service.citavi.com after sending the error report and specify the following session ID:

data.name: LicenseDialog_accountOfflineWarningText
data.value: Citavi currently can't connect to your Citavi Account. Please check your Internet connection. Please note: Citavi will save your license information for up to 365 days when you're working offline. On or before {0} Citavi needs access to your Citavi Account to update your license information. If you continue to work offline after this date, Citavi will start as Citavi Free. As soon as you're connected to the internet again, Citavi will automatically save your license information on this computer.

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipNoDescriptionLabel
data.value: Citavi never sends activity logs or statistical information to our server.

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipNoTitleLabel
data.value: Do not send activity logs or additional information

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipTitle2Label
data.value: Would you like to help improve Citavi's user experience? Please give us permission to send certain information to our server.

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipTitleLabel
data.value: ...while you wait, select which technical information Citavi can send.

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipTitleLabel_NoLegacyProjects
data.value: Select which technical information Citavi can send.

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipYesDescriptionLinkLabel
data.value:
If errors occur, Citavi sends technical information to our server.&edsp;
We cannot guarantee that only anonymous information is sent. For example, a file path that is sent to us because of an error could contain the name of the current user. We do not collect this information and we never use it for any other purpose than error analysis.
In addition to error information we also send statistical data that can help us improve Citavi, for example, the average project size. This information is always anonymous.

data.name: WelcomeWizardDialog_ceipYesTitleLabel
data.value: Send activity logs and additional information

data.name: BackgroundTaskErrorDialog_sendOperationIdLabelText

data.name: ActivateOfflineModeDialog_AttachmentsDescription
ActivateOfflineModeDialog_Description
data.value:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1031{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.17134}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\f0\fs22\lang7 Use Citavi's offline mode to avoid high data costs when working with an expensive Internet connection. \par Differences in offline mode: \par
\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-358\li721\sl240\slmult1 Citavi will only save changes to the cloud when you disable offline mode and have an active Internet connection. \par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}You will not be able to see your team members' changes.\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}In cloud projects you can only see attachments (PDFs, etc.) that you downloaded before enabling offline mode. \par
\pard\sl240\slmult1\par
\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1 You can still do the following: \par
\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-358\li721\sl240\slmult1 It's still possible to use the online search, download citation styles, and import references. \par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}Working with local and DBServer projects is the same as before.\par }

data.name: RecycleBinCapacityExceededMessageBox_textLabel
data.value: Do you want to delete these items anyway? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: RecycleBinCapacityExceededMessageBoxWeb_textLabel
data.value: You selected more than 250 items. These items will be permanently deleted. Do you want to delete these items anyway?

data.name: LookupFullTextDialogEx_ezProxyLoginMsgBox
data.value: Log in to {0} to access to full-text downloads provided by your university or organization.

data.name: PreviewControl_errorTextEditor_DRM_AdobePubSec
data.value: The document is protected with Adobe PubSec security settings, which Citavi does not support.

data.name: RecycleBinDialog_recycleBinDurationWarningLabel
data.value: It can take up to a minute before the items in the recycle bin are available.

data.name: PreviewControl_CantOpenPasswordProtectedFile
data.value: Password protected {0} files cannot be displayed in the preview pane.
